body.name: UMIRRO Silicone Cup Coasters for Drinks with Tailored Holder, Coffee Table Centerpiece, Modern Home Bar or Kitchen Essentials, Black House Décor Gifts, Set of 6, Young Night
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs 37 mins
features: [Crystalline-like Structure] Featuring 3D facades, the architecture-inspired coasters boast attractive visual esthetics and tactile appeal that elevate your tablescape
[Subtlety in Design] Recessed to hold water. The geometric BEVEL CLUSTER helps direct drips to pool, and is thoughtfully laid out to ensure your mugs sit flat, regardless of their sizes

[Soft, yet Firm] Its cool pattern and raised rim form the FRAME that provides support for the entire coaster. As a condensation catcher, it doesn’t flop and spill water that has sweated off a glass filled with iced drinks when you pick it up

[The Highlights] THICK (0.33 in) to protect surfaces from heat; HEAVY (1.9 oz), not be blowing away outside; Non-stick; Non-slip; Hot or cold, indoor and outdoor usage; Protecting your desktop and countertop from scratches; Stain and dirt resistant; Adding a decorative touch to your dining room, bedroom, living area, patio and office; Dishwasher safe

[Perfect Gift Ideas] The set includes 6-piece durable coasters for tabletop protection, a tailored holder, and a charming octagonal box. It’s a cute and trendy gift for family, hostess, friends, women, mom, her, or just for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I really liked the pattern on these coasters because it made it possible to have any, or most, shapes of cups on it. I tried it with very around cups, slim square cups, slim round ones, and they all stayed balanced on the coasters so that was nice. I also liked the variety of colors in a gradient, just a little personal preference of mine due to my OCD is that I wish there wasn't a double of the dark green and one for the rest of the colors. That's just me.I haven't had to clean these yet so I don't know if they're dishwasher safe or can handle super hot tempatures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars coasters are great
reviews.reviewText: I like this coaster set. I like the color variegation within the set. The silicone is non-skid. I'm not worried about hot ceramic mugs or cold glasses with condensation potentially ruining the finish on my furniture. I don't love the coaster corral - I wish it had some protection on the metal. Instead I have to put the whole thing on a coaster. It's kind of weird. But the coasters themselves are good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and Functional
reviews.reviewText: My wife picked these coasters out and she loves the colors and design. They come in a simple, but attractive wire holder to store them. They are silicone so they are very flexible, water proof and pretty much indestructible. They should last forever. They have a really cool weaved design that will catch all the condensation and keep your tables safe from the dreaded water rings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flexible NonSlip Coasters
reviews.reviewText: Baby it's cold outside--and while I wouldn't hesitate to sit a cup of hot chocolate on these coasters outdoors, we use them indoors, as we constantly keep glasses or water bottles available. I wanted something that would catch drips or condensation from our drinks, and these do just that. The sides and patterned 'wells' in the molded silicone contain any drips and keep the furniture dry. They stay put and don't slide around, so I have actually used them on the wide arms of my leather furniture to keep my phone from sliding off. Because the pattern is multi-dimensional, the coasters can be used on the flip side which is fairly flat, with a slightly elevated broken line pattern. However, there are no 'wells' to capture spills, so keep that in mind. I like that the neutral colors and generic pattern do not distract from other decor. These coasters are flexible and not at all flimsy. Because they are silicone I expect they will last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and efficient
reviews.reviewText: This set of coasters are gorgeous! The material alone is awesome because they can easily be washed and dried. My baby even steals them to teethe on them sometimes. Cups sit well on them, surprisingly, without being uneven. These are perfect for any modern home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Design and Functional Outdoor Coasters
reviews.reviewText: The UMIRRO Silicone Coasters have become a nice and stylish addition to my outdoor living space. As a set of 4, they offer a perfect blend of functionality and modern aesthetics. These coasters not only protect my surfaces from beverage condensation but also add a touch of contemporary charm to my space. I use these coasters on my glass top table, and it has eliminated the condensation from going all over the table. The silicone construction makes them ideal for outdoor use, especially on my patio table, ensuring durability and easy maintenance. UMIRRO has truly elevated these coasters beyond mere practicality; they serve as subtle yet effective house decor, seamlessly blending into my lifestyle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick and recessed to hold water
reviews.reviewText: These were just as I thought they would be. They are thick heavy coasters (which is what I wanted for my outdoor patio seating area). As some of the tables or chair arms are wood, I was worried about "sweat" yet these are recessed enough (the design in them is raised) so glass sweat should stay captured within the coaster.Being vinyl/rubber, I would net leave them out at all times as the sun may make them brittle as would ice potentially do so. I don't intend to leave mine out yet saw that as a possibility.Overall, I'm please. Now, to get more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pliable and Water Resistant
reviews.reviewText: These coasters are heavy enough they will not blow away easily, have a design that helps keep them from sticking to the bottom of your drink, and are of a pliable and water-resistant material. When they collect water, a quick shake leaves them relatively dry and ready for a return to service. Good product!
